snippet: The police have identified the mother of “Baby Hope” and are seeking the father, but the illegal immigration status of some witnesses has slowed the investigation.
abstract: New York City detectives searching for Baby Hope's killer are seeking father, but illegal immigration status of some witnesses has slowed investigation; news emerged of break in long-cold case after tip helped detectives identify mother of victim, little girl whose remains, showing signs of abuse, were found stuffed in blue picnic cooler near Henry Hudson Parkway in Upper Manhattan in 1991.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and WINNIE HU

lead_paragraph: The police have identified the mother of “Baby Hope” and are seeking the father, but the illegal immigration status of some witnesses has slowed the investigation.

headline.main: Searching for the Father of ‘Baby Hope’
headline.print_headline: Searching for the Father of ‘Baby Hope’
